nodes.text: A mission took place on the planet Onderon around 3627 BBY as part of a larger conflict between the Sith Empire and Galactic Republic.

Following his ascension to the throne three years prior, King Regalun Petryph greedily sought to strip-mine his planet's rich resources to line his coffers, but his plans were opposed by Senator Deja Nebet and his council of nobles. So Petryph retreated to his royal hunting lodge to avoid their scrutiny, unintentionally subjecting himself to the manipulations of Darth Savik of the Dark Council.

As Onderon was a key refueling station for a Republic fleet intended to reinforce Corellia, where the Empire was planning to assault the Meridian Complex, Savik plotted to catch the fleet unaware by seizing control of the planet's anti-orbital defense cannons. Additionally, Savik plotted to seize Onderon's resources for the Empire. To that end, she manipulated Petryph into believing that Nebet and the nobles were plotting to usurp him in an effort to start a civil war that would serve as a diversion for her agents to reach the cannon controls.
